catalog_info.title: Experimental Physical Chemistry
catalog_info.notes: Recommended as an efficient preparation for research in experimental chemistry, chemical physics, engineering sciences, and related disciplines.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Chemistry 7, or Physical Sciences 1, or equivalent; Applied Mathematics 21a or Mathematics 21a; one full course in physics or equivalent. Recommended: Chemistry 160, Physics 143a or similar, a course in Quantum Mechanics.
catalog_info.description: Hands-on introduction to physical methods and techniques used widely in chemistry and chemical physics research laboratories. Computer-based methods of data acquisition and analysis are used throughout.
